topic.title: What's new in Release 16.2
topic.p: For Mingle onsite customers, please review the upgrade instructions before moving to Mingle 16.2.

note.item: All of the features below are already available for our Mingle in the cloud customers.

section.title: Touch-screen drag and drop
section.p: Mingle is now touchscreen-friendly. Drag and drop cards across the wall, tabs across the header, and reorder swimlanes from your tablet, phone, or touchscreen TV. Read more here.

section.title: Edit names of favorites
section.p: Rename team favourites and your own favorites at will. Anyone on the team can edit the names of team favorites. You can rename your own favorites whenever you like. Read more here.
We’ve also got a new Save icon for each favorite.

section.title: Drag and reorder tags on a card
section.p: Reorder tags on a card by dragging them. The first tag is displayed on the card in the grid view. Read more here.

section.title: Export and import checklists
section.p: When cards in a project are exported, the checklists on those cards are also exported and are available in the .csv. When whole projects are exported, checklists are exported with every card as well. Read more here.
Similarly, when a .csv is imported with checklists, cards are created with the checklists automatically attached.

section.title: Checklists in card defaults
section.p: Set up a checklist for any card type. Each time you create a card of that type, the card will automatically have the checklist attached. Read more here.

section.title: Add checklist items to the bottom of the list
section.p: Every new item you add to the checklist goes to the bottom of the list instead of on the top.

section.title: Upgrade to Ruby 1.9
section.p: We’ve upgraded the version of Ruby we were using. Read more here.

section.title: End of life
section.p: Mingle will no longer support Go integration.

section.title: Bug fixes
section.p: The following bugs have been fixed with 16.2:

bullets.item: Fixed issue where email addresses are case sensitive on sign-in.
Fixed issue where auto-saved filtering on dependency tab for a user breaks when a project is exported and re-imported.
Fixed issue where project Admin Pages section - “Overview Page” link always directs to the first tab.
Fixed issue where card transitions fail if the card popup is opened from anywhere other than a grid view.
Fixed issue where escape characters in the names of trees causing errors.
Fixed issue where text editor in cards and pages does not wrap long links or blocks of text.
Fixed issue where returning to a list view retains the checkboxes selected in the column dropdown.
Fixed issue where styling on the edit tree aggregate popup.
